title: Scientific Injection Molding I:  Certification Course
desc: This Course is For: ? Molding Technicians & Set-up Personnel, Process & Tooling Engineers, Production Supervisors, Manufacturing and Process Engineering Supervisors and other personnel desiring to learn Scientific Molding Principles and how to properly setup an injection molding machine while correlating classroom theory with hands-on machine time.?  ? Class Duration:  5 Days -  2.5 Days Machine Time  and 2.5 Days Lecture/Classroom.?  ? Optional :  6 th  Day for attendees who desire Formal Certification.?  Cost to Attend:  $2695.00 ? Suggested Pre-Requisites:?  ? ? Course Summary:  Scientific Molder 1 is a one week training program for molders with existing experience who wish to learn Scientific Molding from the Plastics Point of View and apply this knowledge using screw position switchover processing techniques.?
